Name: Garden Magic
About the game: A short match 3 game with unique mechanics. You can connect several similar objects in one line, and in addition, you can combine objects from a similar category and additionally include special shapes in the connection. As a result, you can build big combos for more points. You are given 300 seconds to complete the task. Get the highest score. A game for the whole family.
